verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- over שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El, unto Samuel עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- long מָתַי֙ <WH4970> ma-Tai How אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah will you מִתְאַבֵּ֣ל <WH56> mit-'ab-Bel How long wilt thou mourn אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- over שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, for Saul וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I מְאַסְתִּ֔יו <WH3988> me-'as-Tiv, seeing I have rejected מִמְּלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> mi-me-Loch him from reigning עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; Israel מַלֵּ֨א <WH4390> mal-Le accomplish קַרְנְךָ֜ <WH7161> kar-ne-Cha thine horn שֶׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> She-men, with oil וְלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> ve-Lech and go אֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֙ <WH7971> 'esh-la-cha-Cha I will send אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- over יִשַׁ֣י <WH3448> yi-Shai thee to Jesse בֵּֽית־ beit- הַלַּחְמִ֔י <WH1022> hal-lach-Mi, the Bethlehemite כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for רָאִ֧יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti for I have provided בְּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> be-va-Nav among his sons לִ֖י li מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> Me-lech. me a king

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> 'eich How אֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech, along וְשָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> ve-sha-Ma' hear שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul ;if Saul וַהֲרָגָ֑נִי <WH2026> va-ha-ra-Ga-ni; [it] he will kill ס sa-Mek וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me And the LORD עֶגְלַ֤ת <WH5697> 'eg-Lat A heifer בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> ba-Kar bull תִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> tik-Kach Take בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha, with thee וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> ve-'A-mar-ta, and say לִזְבֹּ֥חַ <WH2076> liz-Bo-ach to sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh to the LORD בָּֽאתִי׃ <WH935> Ba-ti. I am come

וְקָרָ֥אתָ <WH7121> ve-ka-Ra-ta And call לְיִשַׁ֖י <WH3448> le-yi-Shai Jesse בַּזָּ֑בַח <WH2077> baz-Za-vach; to the sacrifice וְאָֽנֹכִ֗י <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi, and I אוֹדִֽיעֲךָ֙ <WH3045> o-di-'a-Cha and I will shew אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh, thee what thou shalt do וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֣ <WH4886> u-ma-shach-Ta and thou shalt anoint לִ֔י Li, אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom אֹמַ֖ר <WH559> 'o-Mar unto me [him] whom I name אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha. about

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as did שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El, And Samuel אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, that which the LORD וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came בֵּ֣ית beit לָ֑חֶם <WH1035> La-chem; to Bethlehem וַיֶּחֶרְד֞וּ <WH2729> vai-ye-cher-Du trembled זִקְנֵ֤י <WH2205> zik-Nei And the elders הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> ha-'Ir of the town לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <WH7122> lik-ra-To, to meet וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said שָׁלֹ֥ם <WH7965> sha-Lom favor בּוֹאֶֽךָ׃ <WH935> bo-'E-cha. Comest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom, Peaceably לִזְבֹּ֤חַ <WH2076> liz-Bo-ach to sacrifice לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD בָּ֔אתִי <WH935> Ba-ti, I am come הִֽתְקַדְּשׁ֔וּ <WH6942> hit-kad-de-Shu, sanctify וּבָאתֶ֥ם <WH935> u-va-Tem yourselves and come אִתִּ֖י <WH854> 'it-Ti for בַּזָּ֑בַח <WH2077> baz-Za-vach; with me to the sacrifice וַיְקַדֵּ֤שׁ <WH6942> vay-kad-Desh And he sanctified אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשַׁי֙ <WH3448> yi-Shai Jesse וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> ba-Nav, and his sons וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and called לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לַזָּֽבַח׃ <WH2077> laz-Za-vach. them to the sacrifice

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi become בְּבוֹאָ֔ם <WH935> be-vo-'Am, And it came to pass when they were come וַיַּ֖רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar that he looked אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלִיאָ֑ב <WH446> 'e-li-'Av; on Eliab וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אַ֛ךְ <WH389> 'ach Surely נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged is before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Surely the LORD'S מְשִׁיחֽוֹ׃ <WH4899> me-shi-Cho. anointed

Neither hath the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִשַׁי֮ <WH3448> yi-Shai unto Jesse הֲתַ֣מּוּ <WH8552> ha-Tam-mu Are here all הַנְּעָרִים֒ <WH5288> han-ne-'a-Rim babe וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, said ע֚וֹד <WH5750> od yet שָׁאַ֣ר <WH7604> sha-'Ar There remaineth הַקָּטָ֔ן <WH6996> hak-ka-Tan, yet the youngest וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold רֹעֶ֖ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh and behold he keepeth בַּצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> batz-Tzon; the sheep וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִשַׁי֙ <WH3448> yi-Shai unto Jesse שִׁלְחָ֣ה <WH7971> shil-Chah Send וְקָחֶ֔נּוּ <WH3947> ve-ka-Chen-nu, and fetch כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- we will not נָסֹ֖ב <WH5437> na-So him for we will not sit down עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בֹּא֥וֹ <WH935> bo-'O till he come פֹֽה׃ <WH6311> Foh. hither

וְר֧וּחַ <WH7307> ve-Ru-ach But the Spirit יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD סָ֖רָה <WH5493> Sa-rah departed מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> me-'Im from שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul; from Saul וּבִֽעֲתַ֥תּוּ <WH1204> u-vi-'a-Tat-tu troubled רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> Ru-ach- spirit רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah and an evil מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. from the LORD

יֹאמַר־ <WH559> yo-mar- now command נָ֤א <WH4994> na now אֲדֹנֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH113> 'a-do-Ne-nu Let our lord עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha thy servants לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha, [which are] before יְבַקְשׁ֕וּ <WH1245> ye-vak-Shu thee to seek out אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man יֹדֵ֖עַ <WH3045> yo-De-a' [who is] a cunning מְנַגֵּ֣ן <WH5059> me-nag-Gen player בַּכִּנּ֑וֹר <WH3658> bak-kin-Nor; on an harp וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah, shall come בִּֽהְי֨וֹת <WH1961> bih-Yot shall come עָלֶ֤יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha and רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> Ru-ach- spirit אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him from God רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah, and it shall come to pass when the evil וְנִגֵּ֥ן <WH5059> ve-nig-Gen is upon thee that he shall play בְּיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> be-ya-Do with his hand וְט֥וֹב <WH2895> ve-Tov and thou shalt be well לָֽךְ׃ Lach. פ Peh
